title: Digital Marketing Designer
job_overview:
Urgent Hiring

Responsibilities:

Create engaging marketing materials, including graphics, banners, and animated GIFs
Leverage tools like ChatGPT to generate content ideas, subject lines, and creative copy
Build and manage email campaigns using MailChimp
Assist with trade show layouts and designs
Utilize Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) to create or enhance email graphics and layouts.
Catalog Design and Updates:
Often creates content for websites.
Other tasks related to graphic designs

Qualifications:

Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
A background in hardware or signage industry is huge plus
A background in the E-commerce industry is a huge plus.
Strong working knowledge of MailChimp, including campaign building and analytics
Familiarity with ChatGPT or other AI tools for content generation
Experience creating and animating GIFs or short-form digital content
Ability to analyze email performance metrics and provide actionable insights
